title: Can't purchase Rp with my credit card it says "You have encountered an error. Please try again"

replies.body:
That type of error can be caused by a few different things, but most often it happens when there's some kind of discrepancy between the information you entered and what information is tied to your card. Make sure to double check that info first!

It can also sometimes pop up when your network has a bit of difficulty getting a solid signal with our servers, so go ahead and check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quickly as well!
